thread.title: Musical 'Waitress' to star Jessie Mueller on Broadway
thread.title_full: Musical 'Waitress' to star Jessie Mueller on Broadway

author: MARK KENNEDY
title: Musical 'Waitress' to star Jessie Mueller on Broadway
text:
Charles Sykes Musical 'Waitress' to star Jessie Mueller on Broadway 
FILE - In this June 1, 2014 file photo, Jessie Mueller attends the Drama Desk Awards in New York. Theater producers Barry and Fran Weissler said Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, that the Tony Award-winning Mueller will star in the musical adaptation of the 2007 film "Waitress" with songs by pop star Sara Bareilles. Mueller won the best leading actress in a musical Tony last year for playing Carole King in the musical "Beautiful." (Photo by Charles Sykes/Invision/AP, File) Posted: Friday, October 2, 2015 8:46 am | Updated: 10:01 am, Fri Oct 2, 2015. Musical 'Waitress' to star Jessie Mueller on Broadway Associated Press | 
NEW YORK (AP) — Jessie Mueller, last seen on Broadway as a King, is coming back as a waitress. 
Theater producers Barry and Fran Weissler said Friday that the Tony Award-winning Mueller will star in the musical adaptation of the 2007 film "Waitress" with songs by pop star Sara Bareilles.
